title: Deep Sea Nami

embed.description: http://imgur.com/83mkZI6 http://imgur.com/egcMtcy Deep Sea Nami is swimming her way from the deep, up onto the Rift (she’s not flopping around)! Deep Sea Nami is set to be 1350 RP* and includes - All new models and texture - Nami is now a dark and mysterious creature from deep under

body:
Well, it ain't "Deep Terror" but I'm still happy :3

http://i.imgur.com/83mkZI6.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/egcMtcy.jpg

######Edit: Still no PBE access

Edit 2: How about I make this thread a petition to change the name to "Deep Terror"? :P

replies.body:
http://i.imgur.com/OWRtr5x.gif?Noredirect
http://i.imgur.com/YB0dNG7.gif?Noredirect
http://49.media.tumblr.com/770f302224ea1a0953c6a0b7e13d423a/tumblr_msz9ilKAcr1sx4o52o2_400.gif
http://www.mumsnet.com/system/1/assets/files/000/033/663/33663/a1b51c960/original/airplane-2.gif?1461683124
http://images2.fanpop.com/images/photos/5500000/Airplane-airplane-5586109-320-238.gif

So, if I become an arbiter, we can see Shenpai as a skin.
*Starts considering options*
Hey, I was right. They did make a skin for your birthday w/o giving you pbe access.  Damn I am on a roll today.
https://media.giphy.com/media/rl0FOxdz7CcxO/giphy.gif
It's not everything I hoped for and I don't like the splash, but I'll take it.
Is it me or does the splash look kinda outdated?
That's exactly what it looked like to me. Doesn't feel like the same quality or general style as everything else, like they made it with the concept 2.5 years ago.

My reaction to the splash was "Nami's Huge!" I can't be the only one that noticed how she dwarfed ~~Nautilus~~ that diver.

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-FkvQLmhYKU8/V2CLcXh4w3I/AAAAAAAA7oU/J_aBbvWdACEqY6kdq5QM1P1yDr5cYTdCACLcB/s1600/Nami_Splash_7.jpg

My first reaction to that splash was how it looked like old chinese splash arts, blurry and looking like clay. I think they tried to give a turbid deep sea water feel, but didn't fully commit to it. 
Her face also kinda looks like a ball-jointed doll... and the fully human face with everything else fish reminded me of
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/kY6YsX1YzXs/hqdefault.jpg

dear god Jay Jay the Jet Plane 
you're ruining my childhood (or reminding me of the cringes)
stahp plz

edit: for future reference, the thing in the image is not Jay Jay


this is
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/scratchpad/images/8/82/Jay_the_jet.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20131018185510

Out of curiousity, what were you hoping for?
More of the ''deep terror creaters that look like they're blind and have long sharp teeth''?
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/bf/G.Javanicus8.jpg/300px-G.Javanicus8.jpg http://res.cloudinary.com/dk-find-out/image/upload/q_80,w_1440/42-53005836_bowayv.jpg
Like some of these dudes?
But you have to admit that the abilities look amazing.

I'm sure this isn't necessarily going to be a popular opinion, but I honestly think her breasts are really offputting. I know whoever made that boob texture must have been happy with themselves since just about every female champion has the exact same plastic rack at this point, (Where applicable), but I dunno, it just doesn't flow into her anatomy like it should.

i actually fucking love the mohawk

i wish it didnt have the pink on it (more dark and scary would be nice) but you cant have everything i guess :P
#petitiontobeDeepTerror
http://66.media.tumblr.com/3818abb2cef2a1f2339e6e564a3b14af/tumblr_nfqnvd2htq1t0igjoo6_500.gif
places to go, stuff to steal, goddesses of chaos not to piss off :P
+1 for Deep Terror {{champion:267}} rename :P
It needs to be Deep Terror, seriously

For a bit of context on naming, Deep Terror Nami isn't a bad name for her by any means - as we have both Deep Terror and Deep Sea lines - she's not really a terror, and is a bit more on the friendly side, so we opted for Deep Sea. :)
NO NO NO NO NO - I WANT AN EVIL FUCKING SKIN FOR MY SUPPORTS! Sick of this wussy shit ~_~ Damnit where's an evil Penguin when I need him...oh yea he quit Riot RIP my dreams
I agree with you. Thresh is kinda the exception among Supports...

{{champion:223}}?

{{champion:117}}?

My bad, I forgot Tahm, that's true. But for Lulu I disagree. She's more Chaotic than Evil.

And still, the large majority of supports characters are benevolent, and we don't have enough "opposite" skins like Reaper Soraka for them. Where is an Evil Janna, an Evil Sona, etc.

I meant wicked lulu

Reaper soraka completely crossed my mind.

reaper soraka is a joke - it looks so terrible. It's like a nun gone bad - so scary ~_~ once again particles are great, but the skin sucks. Wicked Lulu has a black cat and dark clothing - whoa don't go crazy.
I think both the skins look pretty good ._.
Wicked is cute, reaper is hella ugly as sin and neither are evil.

I mean...she could be.  I would like to see a skin line/funny lore where everything was opposite.  Nami and lux are evil, Jinx is always about keeping order while Caitlin is on a rampage of destruction, etc.  I think that would be a really fun skin line.

Now that I look back, maybe Thresh is the one whose name is out of place and should have been changed?  Sure Kog and Nami's are more of the similar fish based but they are all that deep under water theme.

I remember mistaking your name for an upcoming {{champion:267}} skin on the forums once ... they took my mistake and went "Hey you know what? Let's make that guy's name into a real skin for Nami!" Now I don't regret making a fool of myself :D.

Add one Splash art as well to the post
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-FkvQLmhYKU8/V2CLcXh4w3I/AAAAAAAA7oU/J_aBbvWdACEqY6kdq5QM1P1yDr5cYTdCACLcB/s1600/Nami_Splash_7.jpg

> Edit 2: How about I make this thread a petition to change the name to "Deep Terror"? :P

I would buy that, and maybe play it over urf the namitee.
While it would be nice, Deep Sea really is more fitting. The skin just isn't 'scary', and it is similar to Deep Sea Kog'maw rather than Deep Terror Thresh.
how cool would it be if the fish in the ult swam side to side and kinda followed a sine path

If you have PBE access you can submit your feedback on the PBE post linked below. If not you might talk to Riot KateyKhaos on Twitter about it.

http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/PMo9or5x-pbe-bugs-feedback-thread-deep-sea-nami

For a second I was like "What do you mean?"

Then I realized and was like "You little shit!"

XD
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/glee/images/0/0e/It's_happening_it's_happening.gif/revision/latest?cb=20150309005218

Like, literally one day after I bought the River Spirit skin.
I guess I'll just have to deal with having both of them.

> How about I make this thread a petition to change the name to "Deep Terror"? 

 https://geekxcritique.files.wordpress.com/2015/01/lets-do-this-ucas-gif.gif
This should happen, Riot! Please change Deep Sea Nami name to Deep Terror Nami!

I may have been a jungle main for 2 seasons now, but I'd totally learn support so I have a reason to buy this. I like how she has an angler fish esca (yes I went to wikipedia to find if there was a word for it)
TAKE MY MONEY RIOT.
